member.name: P:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageFile.Path
member.summary: Gets the full path of the file inside the package.

member.name: P:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageFile.EffectivePath
member.summary: Gets the path that excludes the root folder (content/lib/tools) and framework folder (if present).
member.example:
If a package has the Path as 'content\[net40]\scripts\jQuery.js', the EffectivePath will be 'scripts\jQuery.js'.
If it is 'tools\init.ps1', the EffectivePath will be 'init.ps1'.
